column5: Does any body know if there are steelhead in the Bayfield yet?  I am heading down there for steelhead for my first time on Sunday and was just wondering if it is worthwhile.  Or should I head to Goderich?
I think you know another reliable place for that answer.  G-B OD
Bayfield should be on the high side but fishable. Definitely fish in the river.  Welcome to OFC btw.
